title: The 25 most valuable brands worldwide 2020
yAxis: Brand value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Brand in the x axis and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Brand Amazon has the highest Brand value in million U.S. dollars and Volkswagen has the lowest Brand value in million U.S. dollars.
The highest Brand Amazon has 175894.0 more Brand value in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Brand Volkswagen.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Brand in the x axis and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is highest at Brand Amazon and lowest at Brand Volkswagen.
Second maximum Brand value in million U.S. dollars is found at Brand Google.
The difference of Brand value in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Brand is 175894.0.
The Brand Amazon has the highest Brand value in million U.S. dollars, followed by Google, and Apple. Down to the Brand Volkswagen which is the lowest.
The Brand Volkswagen has 2.87 times less Brand value in million U.S. dollars than average.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is 1924604.0 if we add up values of all Brands.
